main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Glenview, Illinois on November 4, 1965, involving a square-shaped object with large yellow lights observed for 22 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as having a square shape and was four times the size of a basketball,There were 10-12 parts of the object all the same size and shape,The object exhibited a square flight pattern but made no sound and left no trail,The observer was a utility control engineer and was watching from in front of Prospect States Bank,The sighting lasted for 22 minutes and included reports from the observer's family.
sighted object: square-shaped object with large yellow lights
witness description: a utility control engineer and his wife and three sons
